title: Disclosure of Public Servants' Personal Information
subject: public officers, employees, and records

abstracts.abstract: Disclosure of Public Servants' Personal Information;  Authorizes certain public employees & officials to provide written notice to data broker to prevent disclosure of specified personal data concerning themselves & related persons; prohibits data broker from disclosing or redisclosing certain data after receipt of such notice; authorizes data brokers to provide e-mail addresses for receipt of such notice under specified conditions; provides for civil actions against data broker for failure to comply; provides standard of fault in such actions; provides that it is not defense that protected information was available through specified means; provides that it is affirmative defense to assert that person is not covered person; provides exceptions; provides for damages & costs.

actions.description: Referred to Industries & Professional Activities Subcommittee
Now in Industries & Professional Activities Subcommittee
